page.title: 04Leisure and Recreation
page.content: In the area leisure can take many forms.Sport is very popular ,as is bingo.Bingo tends to attract older people but there are clubs and discos for the young. {Desborough}has its own {Leisure {Centre }which caters for a variety of ball games and has good facilities. At present a{Swimming Pool}is being built at the centre. For the younger members of the area there are a number of leisure activities available.There is a { {B.M.X }track under construction near { {Pioneer Avenue }and a {Youth Club }on Wednesdays and Fridays for{19}year olds. Also for 11 year olds there is a { Bus Stop Cafe}where kids go to sit and talk, have a drink or eat and also there is an arcade game there.For the{ {older generations}clubs and pubs are still popular.
